snippet.description: ...Sonys Home has had a rocky start. Server issues, lack of compelling content, and a somewhat hostile... its discrimination, Michael Marsh, a gamer who wanted to set up a gay/straight alliance in Home, told..., which contains the word Hell. snippet.title: Hands-on with Sodium One: not quite the evolution Home needs
snippet.description: ...After over a year of existence, PlayStation Home is still struggling to find its place. Despite a wealth of game-themed spaces and even an alternate reality game, there isn't much to do while in Home, something that's been a problem for the service from the very beginning. Enter Sodium One. The curiously named Home space is being billed by Sony as the "next evolutionary step"...

snippet.title: Warhawk invades Home, goes on sale
snippet.description: ...Sony has announced that it will be adding yet another game-related space to PlayStation Home later today, with the Warhawk Command Center. This new area will not only look like the game that it's based on, but will also give users the ability to plan strategies for upcoming Warhawk battles.In addition to various monitors that display high scores and gameplay tips, the area also includes a ne...

snippet.description: ...After what feels like forever, Sonys Home service has finally launched for the PlayStation 3.
